content: this is a summary of a legal text explaining the progress of a cause the court made a decision in a case with reference number iv 712021 on september 29 2021 the procedure lasted for 9 months and 23 days the case involved dividing the assets of a deceased person including two properties unpaid pension benefits and funds in a bank account there are two heirs the daughter and son of the deceased initially the assets were supposed to be divided equally but an agreement was reached where the daughter will pay off the debts and receive one property while the son will receive the other property pension benefits and funds in the bank account the court ruled based on the inheritance act the court received a death certificate and initiated succession proceedings one of the heirs renounced their share which was assigned to the other heir the heirs agreed to issue a decision on inheritance without a probate hearing the court determined the value of the estate and the heirs agreed to pay the court fee the heirs must arrange for the transfer of funds and property ownership based on the courts decision the text also provides instructions for lodging an appeal which must be done within 15 days the appeal should include specific elements and be sent by registered post only a party or their authorized representative can lodge the appeal the instructions were issued on october 29 2021 in ljubljana

metadata.subject_of_succession: real estate, unpaid pension benefits, funds on personal bank account
metadata.relationship_between_parties: daughter and son of the deceased
